name: sk8prk
description: a varya child theme designed by mel choyce
author: jeff ong

scripts.build:variables: node-sass assets/sass/variables.scss assets/css/variables.css --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 && postcss -r assets/css/variables.css
scripts.build:style: node-sass assets/sass/style.scss style.css --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 && postcss -r style.css
scripts.build:style-editor: node-sass assets/sass/style-editor.scss assets/css/style-editor.css --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 && postcss -r assets/css/style-editor.css
